entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 09:12 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.3°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
